H0.text: Having more than one type of cell is required for organisms to carry out the functions of life.

H1.text: Being exposed to sunlight is required for organisms to carry out the functions of life.

H2.text: Having at least one cell is required for organisms to carry out the functions of life.

H3.text: Be able to move is necessary for organisms to carry out the functions of life.

A4.text: Cell (biology), the functional basic unit of life
